name: Esselink.nu Settings
author: Esselink.nu

sections.description:
Settings plugin for custom WP configuration for Esselink.nu WP websites.

Add some extra functions to your WordPress site like:
– Auto WP update function the Core / Themes / Plugins.
– URL redirect
– HTML minfy
– Structured data for SEO
– Change default WP sender e-mail adres
– Relative HTTP/HTTPS protocol
– Image optimalisation
sections.installation:
Automatic Installation:

  1. Go to Admin – Plugins – Add New and search for “esselink.nu”
  2. Click the Install Button
  3. Click ‘Activate’

Manual Installation:

  1. Download esselink-nu-settings.zip
  2. Unzip and upload the ‘esselink-nu-settings’ folder to your ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
